pr_title: implemented sessions pagination for workflow page / projects page

timeline.message: implement sessions paginatin for workflow page / projects page

timeline.bodyText:
I am not familiar with digdag-ui, but it seems you can try to get max page number based on lastId of session.
But it is only correct when the num. of targeted sessions record is equal to lastId.
If we remove old session records or using with multi tenant, it will not work.
timeline.author: yoyama

timeline.bodyText: This calculation may be also not correct as above comment.
timeline.author: yoyama
